snippet.title: Neymar just told his teammates that he's leaving FC Barcelona
snippet.content:
Neymar has just told his Barcelona team-mates that he is leaving the club, as his €222 million (£198.5 million) move to Paris Saint-Germain takes another step forward.
Neymar returned to Spain on Tuesday after a trip to China and Dubai. The Brazilian reported to Barcelona's Ciutat Esportiva training ground on Wednesday morning, but the club confirmed he did not train.
Instead, Neymar used the training ground visit to say farewell to Barcelona superstars like Lionel Messi, Luis Suarez, Gerard Pique, and Andres Iniesta, Spanish press reported.
Neymar was at the Ciutat Esportiva for just 43 minutes before leaving in his own car, .
During that time he "got permission" from coach Ernesto Valverde to "seal his future" and told the players he is leaving, .
PSG keep tight-lipped
PSG president Nasser Al-Khelaifi refused to discuss the potential Neymar deal when pressed for a comment by .
He said: "PSG respect all contracts that exist between other teams and players. I hope to speak about this issue another time."
However, AS claims that the "next logical step" is for Neymar to travel to Paris so he can sign for PSG. Previous reports indicate that .
